annotations.description: Although it hasn't been the most inspiring of performances so far, both teams have had their moments, and we might very well witness some thrilling football in the second half. The hosts are enjoying a clear advantage over the opposition. The home team are playing possession football, while the away team look to find a weakness in the opposition's defence mainly with their rapid counter attacks.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The match has just finished.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray) swings in a dangerous cross from the resulting corner kick, but none of his teammates manage to outjump the defence.

Selcuk Inan (Galatasaray) whips the ball in, but it fails to reach any of his teammates as the opposition's defence averts the threat. The ball goes out for a corner. Galatasaray can continue in their attacking effort.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Today's referee Pavel Kralovec rightly decides to book Blerim Dzemaili (Galatasaray) for his harsh tackle.
Half chance! Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) plays a pass into the box, but Fernando Muslera reacts well to snuff out the attack.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 4 additional min. will be played.
Sebastian Kehl (Dortmund) passes the ball and slows down the tempo so his team can continue with their combination play.

annotations.label: soccer-ball-own
annotations.description: An unfortunate own goal is conceded by Semih Kaya (Galatasaray), who attempted to smack the ball away after a cross, but instead he sends it into the middle of his own goal and behind the goalkeeper's back.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Nothing comes of the resulting corner from Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund). The defence is alert and manages to cut it out.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: That's the end of the game for Sven Bender, who is replaced by Adrian Ramos (Dortmund).

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Cesare Prandelli has decided to substitute Umut Bulut and he is replaced by Burak Yilmaz (Galatasaray).
Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) tries to send a low pass into the box, but it's blocked and cleared. The referee signals a corner kick to Dortmund.
Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) swings in a cross, but the ball is cleared to safety by one of the defending players.

Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) collects a brilliant pass inside the box and finds himself in a goal scoring opportunity. He takes a shot, but the effort is well blocked by one of the defending players.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Yasin Oztekin (Galatasaray) replaces Hamit Altintop.
Hamit Altintop (Galatasaray) swings a cross into the box, but it's far too close to Roman Weidenfeller, who smothers the ball.

Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) attempts to convert a cross into a goal, but his promising header from near the penalty spot towards the left post is denied by a decent save from Fernando Muslera.
Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray) decides to strike the ball towards goal, but his effort fails to threaten the goalkeeper after being well blocked by one of the defenders.

A cross by Blerim Dzemaili (Galatasaray) from the side of the pitch flies into the box, but fails to find its intended target as the aim was poor. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Dortmund.
Selcuk Inan (Galatasaray) crosses the ball forward but it is intercepted.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: A good lofted pass from Pierre Emerick Aubameyang finds Ciro Immobile (Dortmund) on the edge of the area. He collects the ball and rips in a wonderful shot which ends up low in the middle of the goal. The score is now 2:0.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting corner from Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray) is cleared by the defence.
Hamit Altintop (Galatasaray) flights in the cross, but the defender is alert and clears to safety. It will be a corner kick for Galatasaray.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting corner from Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray) comes to nothing.

Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray) sends a cross into the box. However, the opponent's defence eliminates the danger by clearing the ball out. The linesman makes the right call and Galatasaray will have a corner.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Here comes a substitution. Tired Marco Reus (Dortmund) left the pitch, and Ciro Immobile (Dortmund) is coming on to help his team.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Wesley Sneijder takes over corner duties and expertly finds Hakan Balta (Galatasaray), who jumps highest and coolly plants a bullet header into the left side of the goal. The score is now 1:0.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Galatasaray have been awarded a corner kick.
Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray) tries to send the ball in front of the goal, but the opposition's defence averts the threat.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting corner from Selcuk Inan (Galatasaray) only finds one of the defenders, who heads it out of danger.
Hamit Altintop (Galatasaray) sends a pass into the penalty area, but the opponent manages to cut it out. The referee and one of his assistants signal for a corner kick to Galatasaray.
Some great controlled play and passing from Galatasaray. They are increasing their possession of the ball and trying to open up the opposition's defence to hit them swiftly on the break.
Pavel Kralovec blows his whistle after Ilkay Gundogan (Dortmund) brings one of his opponents down with a strong tackle.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Pavel Kralovec shows a yellow card to Hakan Balta (Galatasaray), who isn't surprised as the tackle was really hard and late.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Shinji Kagawa trots off the pitch and is replaced by Ilkay Gundogan (Dortmund).
Blerim Dzemaili (Galatasaray) is adjudged to have been offside when making his run.
Dortmund are showing great team chemistry. They are passing the ball around seamlessly.
Marco Reus (Dortmund) produces a shot from a long range free kick, but it flies well wide of the left post.
An opponent rises to his feet after being downed by Aurelien Chedjou (Galatasaray). Pavel Kralovec saw the sliding tackle and blows for a foul. A free kick has been awarded to Dortmund.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Sokratis (Dortmund) fires the rebound low into the middle of the goal after the ball breaks to him in the box. The score is 2:0.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Marco Reus (Dortmund) works the corner short.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Shinji Kagawa (Dortmund) swings in a cross from the corner, but Fernando Muslera reads it well and gathers the ball. The ball goes out of play. Dortmund are awarded a corner kick.
Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) delivers a low pass into the box which is intercepted. The ball is out of play and the linesman points at the corner flag. Corner to Dortmund.
Erik Durm (Dortmund) is disappointed with himself because he got into a good area but produced a poor cross. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Galatasaray.
Selcuk Inan (Galatasaray) passes the ball and slows down the tempo so his team can continue with their combination play.
Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray) gets a shot away from distance, but wasn't really set to take it and fires well wide of the left post.
Marco Reus (Dortmund) clips an inviting cross into the box, but there's no one in a position to get on the end of it.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: This corner kick is taken with a short pass by Sebastian Kehl (Dortmund).
Shinji Kagawa (Dortmund) sends a sweet pass into the penalty area, but one of the defenders averts the danger. Dortmund have been awarded a corner kick.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Everything is set for the start of the second half.

We are watching a run of the mill game with only a few moments to ignite the crowd. The players surely can surely perform better, they just need to motivate themselves. The home fans will be really pleased with what they've seen from their players so far. Pass and move. The home side have played some possession football so far, while the visitors have been patient as they wait for the right moment to hit them on the break.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: There will be nothing more to see in the first half. The whistle blowing of Pavel Kralovec has ended it.
Osman Tarik Camdal (Galatasaray) is able to continue to play.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 1 min. of stoppage time to be played.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: The game is interrupted now, Osman Tarik Camdal (Galatasaray) picks up a knock and the physio has to come on.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Pavel Kralovec shows the yellow card to Selcuk Inan (Galatasaray) for a heavy challenge.
Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Dortmund) got the ball on the edge of the box and smashed a first time shot, but his effort flew high over the crossbar.
Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Dortmund) produces a dangerous low pass into the penalty area, but the defence manage to cut it out.
Selcuk Inan (Galatasaray) crosses the ball into the box from the free kick, but the defence clears the danger.
Pavel Kralovec blows his whistle for a foul after Sokratis (Dortmund) hacks down one of his opponents. Galatasaray have a free kick.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Marco Reus (Dortmund) collects a killer pass and fires a low shot into the middle of the net, giving the goalkeeper no chance.
Pavel Kralovec blows his whistle and it's Marco Reus (Dortmund) who is penalised for an offensive foul. Good decision by the referee.

Neven Subotic (Dortmund) receives a fine cross inside the box and attempts to score a goal, but his strike flies just a few inches over the bar. The ball goes out of play and Galatasaray will have a goal kick.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The referee blows his whistle, Dortmund are awarded a corner kick.
A pass into the penalty area from Marco Reus (Dortmund) is intercepted by the defence.
Selcuk Inan (Galatasaray) escapes without any punishment from the referee after using excessive force to foul his opponent.

Henrikh Mkhitaryan sprays a wonderful pass out to Shinji Kagawa (Dortmund), who cannot get enough power or direction to cause Fernando Muslera problems and the goalkeeper is able to watch the ball go just wide of the left post.
The cross into the penalty area from Blerim Dzemaili (Galatasaray) needed to be more accurate in order to create a goal scoring opportunity for his team.
Pavel Kralovec blows his whistle after Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Dortmund) kicks an opponent's legs instead of the ball.
Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Dortmund) and Lukasz Piszczek matched up again to find some space for an unmarked teammate.
Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Dortmund) unleashes a powerful shot towards goal, but it is bravely blocked by a self sacrificing defender.
Sokratis (Dortmund) latches on to the corner kick inside the box, but his header crashes against the crossbar! The goalkeeper would have been helpless.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Dortmund will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.
Shinji Kagawa (Dortmund) tries to slide the ball through to a teammate but it's well blocked by a defender.

Erik Durm (Dortmund) attempted to send a defence splitting pass into space where Pierre Emerick Aubameyang was lurking. It could have put him one on one with the goalkeeper, but one of the defending players somehow manages to avert the threat. The ball is behind the touchline and Dortmund will take a throw in.
Felipe Melo (Galatasaray) attempts to find the head of one of his teammates with a promising cross into the box, but a defender outjumps the attackers and averts the threat.
Dortmund are seeing far more of the ball now.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Selcuk Inan (Galatasaray) takes the corner kick and sends a lovely ball into the penalty area, but the opposition's defence is ready and knocks the ball to safety.
A fine lofted pass into the box, sent by Osman Tarik Camdal (Galatasaray), is intercepted by the opposition's defence. Galatasaray have a corner.
Galatasaray try to maintain the tempo of the game by taking a quick free kick.
Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) makes a slide tackle, but referee Pavel Kralovec blows for a foul. Galatasaray are given an advantage. They have a free kick.

Roman Weidenfeller can hear the fans clapping for his superb goalkeeping after he magnificently stops the close range effort from Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray). The ball would have probably ended up low inside the middle of the net.
Referee Pavel Kralovec sees the trip by Sven Bender (Dortmund) and doesn't hesitate to blow his whistle.
Shinji Kagawa (Dortmund) probably handled the ball.

It looks like Osman Tarik Camdal (Galatasaray) saw red with that tackle. Pavel Kralovec won't tolerate such behaviour on the pitch and blows for a foul. There is a free kick near the sideline to Dortmund. Dortmund restart play with a quick free kick.
Sebastian Kehl (Dortmund) passes the ball and slows down the tempo so his team can continue with their combination play.
Flag up against Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray). He had space to move into behind the defence, but he went too soon.
Blerim Dzemaili (Galatasaray) clips a neat ball into the box in the direction of Umut Bulut, but he can't get on the end of the pass.
Lukasz Piszczek (Dortmund) whips a promising cross into the box, but the opposition's defence intercepts the ball.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Shinji Kagawa (Dortmund) takes the corner, but the opposition's defence is ready and clears the ball to safety.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Shinji Kagawa (Dortmund) swings in the corner, but it's comfortably cleared away. Dortmund have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.

Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Dortmund) sends a lofted cross into the penalty area. Unfortunately for him, the opponent's defence deals with his cross comfortably and intercepts it. The linesman points to the corner flag, Dortmund are going to take it.
Marco Reus (Dortmund) gets a shot away from distance, but wasn't really set to take it and fires high and wide.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The ball is whipped in from the corner by Marco Reus (Dortmund), but one of the defenders gets it clear.
Marco Reus (Dortmund) whips the ball into the penalty area, but one of the defenders is alert and spanks it away. The ball is out of play. A goal scoring opportunity from a corner for Dortmund.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee blows his whistle and we are underway.
Dortmund will kick off.
Pavel Kralovec is introduced as the referee for today's match.

annotations.label: lineup1
annotations.description: You can have a look at the starting XIs of both teams in the details of this match.

Hello to all football fans, we are here to bring you a live commentary of the following match, describing all the most interesting and important moments. We'll make sure you won't miss a thing, so just sit back and have fun.

Although it hasn't been the most inspiring of performances so far, both teams have had their moments, and we might very well witness some thrilling football in the second half. The hosts are enjoying a clear advantage over the opposition. The home team are playing possession football, while the away team look to find a weakness in the opposition's defence mainly with their rapid counter attacks.
